Package com.mockrunner.example.struts

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticationStrategy
    Interface for different authentication strategies.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationAction
    This example action simulates a simple authentication system and generates the approriate ActionErrors and ActionMessages.
    AuthenticationActionTest
    Example test for the AuthenticationAction.
    AuthenticationForm
    The ActionForm for the AuthenticationAction.
    GreetingsAction
    This example action takes the name from the GreetingsValidatorForm and loads some messages from the current message resources.
    GreetingsActionTest
    Example test for the GreetingsAction.
    GreetingsValidatorForm  
    LogoutAction
    This example action does the same as LogoutServlet.
    LogoutActionMapping
    This custom action mapping is used by LogoutAction to get the parameter name for the logout request parameter.
    MemoryBasedRepository
    A simple data repository stored in the .
    MockAuthenticationStrategy
    Mock implementation of AuthenticationStrategy because we do not want a database connection into the tests.
    MockOrderManager
    Mock implementation of OrderManager.
    MySQLAuthenticationStrategy
    Example implementation of AuthenticationStrategy.
    OrderAction
    This action fulfils the order for some type of product.
    OrderActionTest
    Example test for the OrderAction.
    OrderForm
    The ActionForm for the OrderAction.
    OrderManager
    The OrderManager used in OrderAction.
    ShoppingCartAction
    This simple LookupDispatchAction returns different forwards, depending on the called handler method.
    ShoppingCartActionTest
    Example test for the ShoppingCartAction.
    StoreDataAction
    This example action demonstrates the access to a data repository stored in the ServletContext.
    StoreDataActionTest
    Example test for StoreDataAction.
